- Libraries

```{r}
library(ModelTBBCGEngland)
library(tidyverse)
library(epiR)
```

- Load model

```{r}
model_dir <- "results/evaluated-scenarios-2018-09-27_16:16:21-calibration-run/baseline-2018-09-27_16:16:22"

model <- ModelTBBCGEngland::read_libbi(file.path(model_dir, "libbi", "posterior"))

model <- sample(model, nsamples = 1000, target = "prior", sample_obs = TRUE)

plot(model)
```


```{r}
sens <- test_sensitivity(model, obs = "YearlyChildInc", target_time = NULL)

sens
```


- Plot sensitivity


```{r, plot.height = 15}
plot_sensitivity(sens)
```
